ofcprobe.vswitch.main.config

Class HostMapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • ofcprobe.vswitch.main.config.HostMapper

  • public class HostMapper
extends java.lang.Object
    This Class tries to Map every free SwitchPort to a Device
    Author:
    Christopher Metter(christopher.metter@informatik.uni-wuerzburg.de)
